input.sentences: the choice for dinner tonight is fresh fish .
the fish are filleted first and then steamed .
the table is full of food and everyone is enjoying their meal .
after the meal the group takes a long walk .
they see the sunset behind the trees .
output.sentences: Tonight we are eating fresh fish
I steamed the fish and also filleted it
We had a nice meal on the table, the food was great!
We took a walk after the meal
We saw the sunset and many beautiful trees
